attributes.action: intervene for the purpose of securing the release back to Britain of all innocent British nationals who are currently being detained abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are currently British nationals who have been declared to be innocent of any crime yet continue to be detained abroad by foreign governments. This petition requests the support of our government to encourage and assist in the speedy resolution of such cases so that these nationals can be returned home without further delay.

reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
